assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Dhampur Sugar Mills Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated sugarcane processing company in India. The company operates through three segments: Sugar, Chemicals/Distillery, and Power. It manufactures and sells refined, white, retail, and raw sugar; ethanol, rectified spirit ethyl acetate, extra neutral alcohol, ethyl acetate, and other allied products; industrial gases; and bio-fertilizers. The company also generates power using bagasse. It operates cogeneration facilities with a total installed capacity of approximately 220.5 megawatts. The company was founded in 1933 and is based in New Delhi, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Sandeep Kumar Sharma
companyOfficers.title: COO, Head of Dhampur & Rajpura Mills and Whole Time Director

companyOfficers.title: Compliance Officer, Assistant GM of Corp. Affairs & Company Sec.
